title: Freelance Web Designer
details: Drafted and designed responsive static pages using Figma.
Translated UI/UX deisgn into functional web interface using HTML CSS and TypeScript.

title: Frontend Web Developer
details: Develop and maintain company websites using ReactJS, NextJS, and TailwindCSS.
Draft designs, wireframes, and interactive prototypes for revamping company websites using Figma.
Integrate new features and UI improvements based on business requirements and user feedback.
Connect frontend applications to FastAPI backends for dynamic data fetching.
Utilize Postman to test and debug API endpoints.
Create and deploy static websites from scratch.
Assist DevOps in CI/CD pipeline setup and deployment process.

title: Full Stack Developer Intern
details: Collaborated with a team to fix bugs and conduct quality assurance for the web application using ReactJS and Firebase before transitioning to the Odoo custom module project.
Developed custom module application for Odoo V16, including creating admin manual documentation and conducting benchmark tests.
Followed Scrum methodology, participating in daily stand-up meetings.
Assigned and documented tickets for project-related tasks and issues.

title: Graphic Designer and Digital Marketing Intern
details: Collaborated with a team to design ad posters and promotional materials for an e-commerce platform.
Managed company files to ensure smooth business operations.
Worked with Adobe Photoshop, and Canva.
